description:
Computes the arc tangent of `x`. The arc tangent is the inverse function of the tangent so that *`arctan(tan(x)) = x`*.

Works on radians only.
No-data values are passed through and therefore get propagated.

returns.description: The computed angle in radians in the range *(−π/2, π/2)*.

links.title: Inverse tangent explained by Wolfram MathWorld
